title: Sammy Hagar - Live Glasgow 1982 ak320
description:
Sammy Hagar - Live Glasgow 1982 ak320

Sammy Hagar went all over the place in the 80's he was one of the hottest tickets in the world . And Van Halen knew it.
At this point Hagar switched to Geffen Records, and was successful with them. 1981's Standing Hampton went platinum, 1982's Three Lock Box went gold (half a million shipments) and 1984's VOA went platinum. Hagar briefly formed a supergroup HSAS who released an album.
In 1985, Hagar would join Van Halen, . It was under Hagar that the band would achieve their commercial peak, 


Tracklist

01 Heavy Metal.mp3
02 This Planet's On Fire (Burn In Hell).mp3
03 Plain Jane.mp3
04 Baby's On Fire.mp3
05 I'll Fall In Love Again.mp3
06 Trans Am (Highway Wonderland).mp3
07 Sweet Hitchhiker.mp3
08 Love Or Money.mp3
09 Inside Lookin' In.mp3
10 Can't Get Loose.mp3
11 Rock'n'Roll Weekend.mp3

Apollo Theatre
Glasgow, Scotland
January 28th, 1982
FM Broadcast


Players

Sammy Hagar - Vocals, Guitar
Gary Pihl - Guitar, Keyboards, Vocals
Bill Church - Bass, Vocals
David Lauser - Drums, Vocals
